channel.title: Exitium (PI) REP++ LOGIN STATS
channel.description:
basically when you login you receive 13034436 xp with all combat stats; same with when you logout then in (with training experience).
i've looked in pretty much every main file but I just can't find it..
basically every time you login you get level 99 (in combat stats).

item.title: Exitium (PI) REP++ LOGIN STATS
item.dc:creator: @Agent_Jugz Agent Jugz
item.description:
@Agent_Jugz wrote:

I’ve looked there, nothing.

Could this have anything to do with it? (this is in PlayerAssistant.java).

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;
if (exp > 13034430)
return 99;
for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0
* Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
if (output >= exp) {
return lvl;
}
}
return 0;
}

public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill){
	if (c.expLock) {
		return false;
	}
	if (amount+c.playerXP[skill] < 0 || c.playerXP[skill] > 200000000) {
		if(c.playerXP[skill] > 200000000) {
			c.playerXP[skill] = 200000000;
		}
		return false;
	}
	amount *= Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS;
	int oldLevel = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]);
	c.playerXP[skill] += amount;
	if (oldLevel < getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])) {
		if (c.playerLevel[skill] < c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) && skill != 3 && skill != 5)
			c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]);
		levelUp(skill);
		c.gfx100(199);
		requestUpdates();
	}
	setSkillLevel(skill, c.playerLevel[skill], c.playerXP[skill]);
	refreshSkill(skill);
	return true;
}[/code]

Read full topic
